description:
####### 1.2.0: Added backup feature, now you can send your logs to your mail.########

ABOUT
•	Tracking your BP level helps you and your doctor to control BP and its many health releated issues.
•	The BP Tracker simplifies BP data (systolic level, diastolic level, pulse level) logging.
•	By using this app will allow you to enter the multiple BP readings at different times of a day.
•	 This app saves the systolic level, diastolic level, pulse level, time of the measurement and note.
•	In addition to being a convenient data logger the software is also a voluble tool for systolic level, diastolic level, and pulse level longitudinal trends analysis using graphs.
•	 This app will allow you to search logs by note.
•	Very easy to use.

Features:
•	The intuitive interface for data logging.
•	Over sized numbers for easy data entry.
•	Monitor the changes of systolic level, diastolic level, and pulse level over time on the longitudinal graphs.
•	This app will allows you to send logs to doctor. 
•	Very simple and easy to use.
